What is (are) Parasites - Enterobiasis (also known as Pinworm Infection) ?,"A pinworm (""threadworm"") is a small, thin, white roundworm (nematode) called Enterobius vermicularis that sometimes lives in the colon and rectum of humans. Pinworms are about the length of a staple. While an infected person sleeps, female pinworms leave the intestine through the anus and deposit their eggs on the surro
